titles.title: Centennial District Authorization Act of 2009
A bill to establish the Centennial Historic District in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Centennial District Authorization Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
Centennial District Authorization Act of 2009 - Establishes in the City of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, the Centennial Historic District (District).
Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make grants to, or enter into cooperative agreements with, state or local government agencies, nonprofit entities, and any leaseholders to administer the District. Directs the Secretary to: (1) prepare a plan for the development of historic, architectural, natural, cultural, recreational, and interpretive resources within the District; and (2) provide financial assistance for capital improvement projects in the District.
